page.title: 18ATTITUDES OF THREE LADIES.
page.content: These are the answers we got from the lady who had lived in Eyam for a large number of years. {1. I would like to see more provision {for houses for younger people who have {just got married and more work in Eyam {/example a factory /. {2.I like living in Eyam because it is {small and you know people for years {and years and because of the {countryside. {3.Yes i find plenty to do in Eyam. {4.No thankyou , i would not like to {live elsewhere.} These are the answers we got from the lady who moved to Eyam in 1984. {1. I would like to see more things for {teenagers to do at night like youth {clubs. {2. I find village life friendly and {you know more people because it is {small. }(CONT ON PAGE 19)
